lines.text: Please, Monsieur Charlier. You know that kissing is not hygienic. Doctors claim that millions die each year from kissing.

[kissing Mimi]
Oh, yes? But what a pleasant way to die! Darling, kill me quick!
Rene, why don't you marry, get yourself a wife of your own, and leave me alone?
If I can't be happy with another man's wife, how can I be happy with one of my own?
That's an old Chinese proverb. If it's not, it should be.
That's It! A betrayed husband, under certain conditions, can remain a tragic figure. But a husband who can be laughed at is only a fool.
